name: Milky Animals
description:
A cute and cute animal strategy game
If you purchase, you can acquire over 100 different animals through a draw.
Confront over 100 different types of monsters
level up with gold
Obtain Evolution Potions from Daily Dungeon
Evolve into a cuter and more powerful animal with an evolution potion
Form a team and progress through stages strategically
You can acquire gold, jewels, and characters on the stage
Progress through the stages to get more rewards
A game everyone can enjoy
